backend/main.mo: Defines the main persistent actor for products, orders, user profiles, referrals, and marketplace settings with authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old stored actor state to the new schema including contactInfo, email, promo fields, and expanded profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for many frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theming, cart provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: Provides cart state with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation persisted in session storage.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItem type with product details, variants, quantity, and image URL.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with options to return home or sign in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Shows a logout button for authenticated users and handles logout with loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting users to complete their profile and submit required fields.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Guards routes by checking authentication and optional admin access, showing loading or denial screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with logo, search, cart, and user menu driven by auth and settings hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations for granting and revoking admin roles and refreshes admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Implements product CRUD mutations using the actor and invalidates product-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthActions.ts: Wraps login and logout logic for Internet Identity with error handling and cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile and admin status via actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFounderAccess.ts: Provides a mutation to verify a founder email and refresh admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Creates and manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceSetting: Exposes queries and mutations for fetching and updating marketplace settings like name, tagline, and logo.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to create orders and fetch user orders or specific order details.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Supplies queries for fetching all products or a single product by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferral.ts: Handles referral code creation, application, and retrieval of referral summary.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the account page allowing users to view, copy, and apply referral codes, plus see referral stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin interface for managing products, marketplace settings, and admin roles, including delete actions and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductEditorPa: Product creation/editing form supporting images, sizes, colors, validation, and saving via admin API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AuthEntryPage.tsx: Provides login entry options for customers, sellers, and founders with related access checks and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, calculates totals, and shows empty-cart state with navigation back to shopping.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form, promo codes, order submission, and profile setup prompts before creating an order.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a success message and detailed summary of a completed order including items and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays full details of a specific order, including items, status, and contact information, with navigation back to orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists the user's past orders with status indicators and allows navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single product with size/color selection and add-to-cart logic, handling loading, missing products, and profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Shows a product grid with search, price filtering, and size-based filtering, using local state and memoized filters.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Provides utilities to convert blobs and files to image URLs or Uint8Array for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats prices from cents to rupees and converts cents to numeric rupee values.
frontend/src/utils/promoCodes.ts: Validates fixed promo codes and computes a 50% discount when applicable.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for an e‑commerce T‑shirt marketplace.
